official_title: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), that the Clerk of the House of Representatives in the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 15842) to increase compensation for District of Columbia policemen, firemen, and teachers shall make corrections to the bill.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives in the enrollment of H.R. 15842, which provides for specified items relating to the District of Columbia, to make specified corrections.

titles.title: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), that the Clerk of the House of Representatives in the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 15842) to increase compensation for District of Columbia policemen, firemen, and teachers shall make corrections to the bill.
